description:
2 bedroom apartment on the most popular street in the East Village, St Marks. 1 bedroom is not pictured bc it will have no furniture since I'm moving out on the 20th, but the couch stays and pulls out! So there's one bed, one couch.

Five minute walk to 6 train, 10-15 minutes to Union Sq
name: 2 BR apt in ideal East Village spot
review: Leila was perfect we never met her in person but she left the keys for us and was able to answer any questions we had. Her home was very nice and just like the picture. It was just what we wanted
